overview: Viewers get to plan Jade, Sasha, Yasmin and Cloe's next exciting escapades in this interactive animated video based on the line of fashion-conscious toys. The gang's on a mission to find the next hot styles, and they need help deciding where to look. With several story lines to explore, including mega parties, concerts and even filming a music video, going out with the Bratz girls is one never-ending adventure.
title: Bratz: Glitz 'n' Glamour
